head.supplied: Melbourne botan. Garden, ¶ 23/3/68 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to express my best thanks for your goodness of sending me the two copies of Major Beddome's Ferns of India, fascicle XVIII, which have be...

div.p: S68/3050, unit 343, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p:
I have the honor to express my best thanks for your goodness of sending me the two copies of Major Beddome's Ferns of India, fascicle XVIII, which have been deposited in the library of this Office.
See M to J. Moore, 23 March 1868.
I beg to return the receipt for your kind signature

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be, Sir,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Mr Undersecretary Moore.
See also M to J. Moore, 18 May 1868.
